name: Football Match - Js League
shortDescription: Watch a thrilling JS League football match live!
detailedInformation: Experience the excitement of JS League football with top teams battling for supremacy. Enjoy world-class talent and the electric atmosphere in the stadium.

name: Sylhet Cycling Event 2023
shortDescription: Experience the thrill of cycling in Sylhet!
detailedInformation:
Join us for the Sylhet Cycling Event 2023, a thrilling cycling experience through the beautiful landscapes of Sylhet. Whether you're a seasoned cyclist or a beginner, this event offers a variety of routes suitable for all levels of cyclists. 

Date: August 20, 2023
Time: 8:00 AM
Venue: Sylhet City, Sylhet, Bangladesh

Explore the lush green hills, winding roads, and serene tea gardens as you pedal your way through Sylhet's picturesque scenery. This event promises an unforgettable day of cycling, camaraderie, and adventure. Grab your cycling gear and be a part of this exciting event!

name: Tennis Grand Slam - Wimbledon
shortDescription: Experience the elegance of Wimbledon tennis.
detailedInformation: Enjoy the grace and precision of tennis at its finest. Wimbledon is known for its tradition, world-class players, and epic matches on grass courts.

name: Basketball Championship - Finals
shortDescription: Cheer for your team in the NBA Finals!
detailedInformation: Witness the intensity of the NBA Finals. See the best basketball players in the world compete for the championship in an electrifying atmosphere.

name: Horse Racing Derby
shortDescription: Witness the excitement at the Horse Racing Derby!
detailedInformation: Experience the thrill of horse racing as majestic thoroughbreds compete for glory. Feel the excitement of the race, place your bets, and cheer for your favorite horses.

name: Golf Masters Tournament
shortDescription: Enjoy the tranquility of golf at the Masters Tournament.
detailedInformation: Watch golf's greatest players compete at the prestigious Masters Tournament. Marvel at their skill and precision on the beautiful Augusta National Golf Club course.
